definitions.definition: A prefecture and island group of Japan .
The main island of the Okinawa and Ryukyu Islands, in Okinawa Prefecture , Japan .
The second-largest city on Okinawa Island, in Okinawa Prefecture , Japan .
The Battle of Okinawa , which took place on the island of Okinawa in 1945.

main_definition: A prefecture and island group of Japan .
secondary_definitions: The main island of the Okinawa and Ryukyu Islands, in Okinawa Prefecture , Japan .
The second-largest city on Okinawa Island, in Okinawa Prefecture , Japan .
( historical , World War II ) The Battle of Okinawa , which took place on the island of Okinawa in 1945.
